summary: Walt Disney Animation Studios, started by brothers Walt and Roy Disney in 1923, is the world's oldest animation studio. It's famous for creating beloved characters like Mickey Mouse and movies such as "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs" (1937) and "Frozen" (2013). Originally called Disney Brothers Cartoon Studio, it went through several name changes before becoming Walt Disney Animation Studios in 2006. The studio has pioneered many animation techniques and has had huge box office successes. While they've focused on computer animation lately, they're open to making more hand-drawn films in the future.
title: Walt Disney Animation Studios
